paragraphs.charter: The data you provide is used in accordance with the Home Office's personal information charter. This includes information about the applicant and any person sponsoring their application. The Home Office is the data controller, which means that it decides how this information will be used and stored. The information will be held in confidence and handled in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
paragraphs.help: The information will be used to help:
paragraphs.passedOn: Your information may be passed on to third parties, government departments, local authorities, foreign governments and public bodies for the purpose of:
paragraphs.reserves: The Home Office reserves the right to gather information relating to site usage. Any information gathered is mainly for internal use, for example, to improve customer service.
paragraphs.authority: A country or territory may be listed as a nationality or country because it has a passport-issuing authority.

lists.decision: make a decision on an application
lists.accurateInfo: confirming that the information you have provided is accurate
lists.fraud: preventing and detecting crime, including fraud and money laundering
lists.training: allowing a third party, government department, local authority or public body to carry out their workstaff training

paragraphs.files: This service puts small files (known as ‘cookies’) onto your computer in order to:
paragraphs.personally: The cookies we use don’t identify you personally.
paragraphs.manage: Find out how to manage cookies.
paragraphs.message: When you first use this service we show a ‘cookie message’. We then store a cookie on your computer so it knows not to show this message again.
paragraphs.analytics: We use Google Analytics to collect information about how you use this service. This helps us check it’s meeting your needs and make improvements.
paragraphs.identified: No personal details are stored with this information, so you can’t be identified.
paragraphs.share: Google isn’t allowed to use or share our analytics data.
paragraphs.optOut: You can opt out of Google Analytics cookies.
paragraphs.secure: We store session cookies on your computer to help keep your information secure while you use this service.

lists.remember: remember what messages you’ve seen so you’re not shown them again
lists.improve: understand how you use this service so we can update and improve it
lists.support: temporarily store information you enter to support your application
lists.gotToSite: how you got to the site
lists.howLong: pages you visit and how long you spend on them

tables.name: Name
tables.seenMessage: Lets us know you’ve already seen our cookie message
tables.sessionId: Stores a session ID and temporarily stores data you enter to enable you to make an application

feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.
